title: 177: Understanding What Drives You
description:
In today's episode, we're going to start getting into unlocking your limitless motivation. This is the heart and the why of everything that you do, your motive for action. 

It's easy to put the hard things away, but I want to train you to build the discipline to do the hard things. 

I will explain what I mean by that in this lesson and give you an exercise you can do to identify your purpose and understand what drives you. 

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
